column3:
Noon found the earthman in a private audience chamber of Tardos
Mors, Jeddak of Helium, grandfather of Dejah Thoris.
column4: John Carter and the Giant of Mars

column3:
It was midnight when the speaker sounded, jerking Carter to
wakefulness. Kantos Kan was signalling again, excitedly.
column4: John Carter and the Giant of Mars

column3:
However, the malagors proved speedy mounts. By noon the next day
the trio had reached the City of Thark, inhabited by a hundred
thousand green warriors over whom Tars Tarkas ruled.
